page.title: 09ARNCLIFFE SCHOOL SPORTS
page.content: In the last week of the summer term Arncliffe School holds a Sports day. The sports are held on the school field. While the spectators are mainly parents, friends and governors, visitors are welcomed too. The sports include serious events like flat races, skipping races, sack races, bean bag races and a relay race. Some races are purely for fun, such as dressing up races, egg and spoon races, parents' and teachers' events. With the small number of children involved, the races are usually divided into heats for four age ranges. The distance also varies according to the age of the group, the longest distance being three times round the field past the septic tank!
